laboratory_examinations.findings: A heterogeneous region of low attenuation in the right frontal lobe without evidence of enhancement after administration of contrast material. There was mass effect on adjacent structures.

A nonenhancing right frontal-lobe lesion with some mass effect. The bulk of the lesion has signal characteristics of solid tissue â€” bright on T2-weighted and FLAIR sequences, isointense to slightly hypointense to gray matter on T1-weighted sequences.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: On the final study, some dorsolateral infiltrative signal remains, but the initial high-grade component is no longer present.

laboratory_examinations.findings: The finding of a region of higher metabolic activity with a choline-to-creatine ratio greater than 4:1, indicating a possible grade 2 to 3 astrocytic tumor or anaplastic oligodendroglioma.
Demonstrated allelic loss for both 1p and 19q.
